item.title: [317]Adding a Attack Interface![Non-Delta]
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

Credits:
spy man47 30% for figuring out for a Delta Server and giving me a base
Code God Of Rs(Me) 70% for converting it for regular 317 server use and editing!

What you need to know:
C&P
Some Basic Java
A understanding of Runescape Private Servers!

Difficulty: 1/10

What you need to edit:
Client.java in your server folder!

First Search this:

public void parseIncomingPackets(){

This is the void we need to add it under put it any where else and IT WILL NOT WORK!

Under that add this:

[code]//Attack Interface…
case 33206:
sendFrame126("@dre@Attack Interface", 8716);
for(int V = 0;V<31;V++) {
}

    for(int V = 8720;V<8799;V++) {
            sendFrame126("",V);
    }
    sendFrame126("1",8720);
    sendFrame126("Bronze Items",8760);
    sendFrame126("1",8721);
    sendFrame126("Iron Items", 8761);
    sendFrame126("5",8722);
    sendFrame126("Steel Items",8762);
    sendFrame126("10",8723);
    sendFrame126("Black Items and white items", 8763);
    sendFrame126("20",8724);
    sendFrame126("Mithril items", 8764);
    sendFrame126("30",8725);
    sendFrame126("Adamant Items",8765);
    sendFrame126("40",8726);
    sendFrame126("Rune Items", 8766);
    sendFrame126("60",8727);
    sendFrame126("Dragon Items", 8767);
    sendFrame126("70", 8728);
    sendFrame126("Barrows Items", 8768);
    sendFrame126("99", 8729);
    sendFrame126("Attack Skill Cape.", 8769);
    sendFrame126("",8849);// members only skill
    sendFrame126("",8827);//steel
    sendFrame126("",8837);//mithril
    sendFrame126("",8840);
    sendFrame126("",8843);
    sendFrame126("Attack",8846); // first option
    sendFrame126("Strength",8823);
    sendFrame126("Defence",8824);
    sendFrame126("Mining",8825);
    sendFrame126("Woodcutting",8826);
    sendFrame126("Woodcutting",8827);
    sendFrame126("Prayer",8828);
    sendFrame126("Magic",8829);
    sendFrame126("Fishing",8830);
    sendFrame126("Cooking",8831);
    sendFrame126("Firemaking",8832);
    sendFrame126("Strength",8859);
    sendFrame126("Herblore",8840);
    sendFrame126("Mining",8837);
    sendFrame126("Crafting",8843);
    sendFrame126("Firemaking",8862);
    sendFrame126("Fishing",8865);
    sendFrame126("Cooking",15303);
    sendFrame126("Prayer",15306);
    sendFrame126("Magic",15309);
   
    showInterface(8714);

break;[/code]

Now for the explanation!

When you click the Attack Button under the Skill Tab in your Client you are calling for the 33206 case.

case 33206:(Near the top of the code)

When ever you click a button it has a Corresponding case assigned to it.
For Example: The case for the Strength button is 33209.

Now under that Case we can say what we want to happen when the button is clicked!
For this one we want it to bring up a Interface. That shows Levels of what we want to equip!

sendFrame126("1",8720); sendFrame126("Bronze Items",8760);
These send the words we want to print! The part before the Comma is the text we want the one after the comma is how many lines down we want! So if it was

sendFrame126("10",8730); sendFrame126("What ever",8770);
Both these texts would be 10 lines down from Bronze Items Text!

So if you wanted to Add a Line of text you would add

sendFrame126("TEXT HERE",8720);

sendFrame126("TEXT HERE",8760); Same here,Except In Text here put item name and it would be +1 from last one(Should be 2 lines back is the number you wanna add +1 to)

And finally we add a break; so we don’t have any Errors it stops the case
So if you have a case like case 100: you always need to end with break;

Hope I explained everything Neatly(Heh,I’ve been working on improving that!)
If you need ANY help with this at all don’t Hesitate to PM me!
THIS IS NOT A LEECH OR A COPY ITS A MODIFIED VERSION AND ITS BEEN MODIFIED A LOT AND I ADDED THE ORIGINAL CREATOR IN CREDITS!

This is what it should look like when your done!

(The bar on the side does nothing yet! Sorry!)

V.2 of this is coming out today or tomorrow!

Read full topic
